name: Back To Life (itch) (AlbertVqz)
description:
Back to Life is a 3D Low Poly Tower Defense strategy game based on climate change and deforestation, the goal is to prevent an area from being completely deforested.

Use different types of trees and animals to deal with the loggers who will try to take your resources.

This project is important to make users aware of the damage that is being caused to the planet by deforesting green areas, as well as to encourage the creation of new projects on climate change such as games, applications or new protocols and protection regulations.

This game version is (very) early access.
